item.title: ETF 流入创纪录，中国股市救市全面展开
item.description: 中国交易所交易基金获得了创纪录的资金流入，因为国家支持的买家使出浑身解数来保护市场免受唐纳德-特朗普的关税冲击。【原文：Chinese exchange-traded funds received record inflows as state-backed buyers pulled out all the stops to shield the market against Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught.】

item.title: 日本超长期收益率因拍卖和额外预算担忧而上升
item.description: 由于对 20 年期国债拍卖和补充预算的担忧，日本超长期国债收益率飙升。【原文：Japan’s super long-term government bond yields surge amid concerns about a 20-year auction and a supplementary budget.】

item.title: 印度希望在六周内完成美国贸易谈判的关键环节
item.description: 据一位新德里官员透露，印度将于周一开始与美国进行具体部门的贸易讨论，因为这个南亚国家正急于利用唐纳德-特朗普暂停额外征税三个月的政策。【原文：India will start sector-specific trade discussions with the US on Monday, according to a New Delhi official, as the South Asian nation rushes to take advantage of Donald Trump’s three-month pause on additional levies.】

item.title: 高盛将 4,000 美元黄金提上日程，避风港之争愈演愈烈
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）发出了新一轮看涨黄金的呼声，央行需求强于预期以及黄金作为经济衰退和地缘政治风险对冲工具的作用支撑了人们对 2025 年黄金价格甚至更高的预期。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and UBS Group AG issued another round of bullish calls for gold, with stronger-than-expected central bank demand and the metal’s role as a hedge against recession and geopolitical risks underpinning expectations for even higher prices in 2025.】

item.title: 关税之痛后，LVMH 财报将考验奢侈品行业的神经
item.description: 欧洲奢侈品股今年开局动荡不安，这让投资者对该行业领头羊路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的第一季度业绩有了更多的考虑。【原文：Europe’s luxury-goods stocks have had a turbulent start to the year, giving investors plenty to consider heading into first-quarter results from sector bellwether LVMH.】

item.title: 关税将影响数百万中国工人，对经济造成打击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战导致中国经济放缓，就业市场的蹒跚起步正在削弱中国政府与美国抗衡所需的韧性。【原文：As China staggers into a slowdown caused by Donald Trump’s trade war, a hobbled jobs market is impairing the resilience Beijing needs to battle it out against the US.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市第二周下跌后有望上涨
高盛称，如果日元逼近 130，日本央行可能考虑停止加息
item.description: 据高盛公司（Goldman Sachs Inc.【原文：The Bank of Japan may consider pausing its interest-rate hikes if the yen strengthens toward 130 per US dollar and its outlook for sustained inflation dims, according to analysts at Goldman Sachs Inc.】

item.title: 这个逾越节，每个人都有问题
item.description:
来自市场的信息是，是时候做出严肃的回答了。【原文：

The message from markets is that it’s time for some serious answers.

】

item.title: 中国允许新建煤电厂至 2027 年，以填补可再生能源缺口
item.description: 根据中国政府的新指导方针，中国将允许燃煤发电厂的建设至少持续到 2027 年，该指导方针还呼吁发电企业确保能够满足间歇性可再生能源的供应缺口。【原文：China will allow coal-fired power plants to be built through at least 2027, according to new guidelines from the government, which also call on generators to ensure they’re able to meet gaps in supply from intermittent renewables.】

item.title: 索尼将 PS5 在欧洲的售价提高 25%，而美国很可能会提价
item.description: 索尼集团公司将其 PlayStation 5 游戏机在欧洲和英国的售价提高了约 25%，而美国的售价很可能会提高。【原文：Sony Group Corp. raised the price of its PlayStation 5 console by around 25% in Europe and in the UK ahead of a likely US increase.】

item.title: 摩根大通的米歇尔因美联储和储备金数据对债券持更积极态度
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）认为，在外国需求强劲的迹象以及美联储将在必要时支持美国国债的预期下，国债目前可能已经触底。【原文：Treasuries may have hit the bottom for now amid signs of robust foreign demand and expectations for the Federal Reserve to support US government debt when needed, according to JPMorgan Asset Management.】

item.title: 顶级银行称南非向交易型电力市场迈进
item.description: 据一家顶级投资银行称，南非即将启动电力交易市场，为消费者提供电力产品选择和一系列定价方案。【原文：South Africa is on the cusp of starting a traded electricity market that will give consumers a choice of power products along with a range of pricing options, according to a top investment bank.】

item.title: 奥兰公司将从沙特出售所得的 20 亿美元用于降低债务
item.description: 新加坡食品企业集团奥兰集团（Olam Group Ltd.）表示，将利用最近出售其农业业务部门股权的收益偿还债务，从而使其股价在周一上涨了 4%。【原文：Singaporean food conglomerate Olam Group Ltd. said it will use proceeds from the recent stake sale in its agri-business unit to pay off debt, sending its shares up 4% on Monday.】

item.title: 贸易困境加剧，中国大宗商品进口萎缩，石油除外
item.description: 3 月份是特朗普政府通过对中国商品征收惩罚性关税掐断双边贸易之前的最后一个整月，中国的大宗商品进口大多同比下降。【原文：China’s commodities imports mostly fell year-on-year in March, the last full month before the Trump administration choked off bilateral trade by imposing punitive levies on Chinese goods.】

item.title: 泰国在下周会谈前敲定美国贸易战略
item.description: 泰国计划于下周与特朗普政府官员举行会谈，以争取免除计划中对其商品征收的 36% 的互惠关税，官员们正在敲定一套削减泰国对美 460 亿美元贸易顺差的建议。【原文：Thailand aims to hold talks with Trump administration officials next week to secure relief from a planned 36% reciprocal tariff on its goods, with officials finalizing a set of proposals to cut its $46 billion trade surplus with the US.】

item.title: 亿万富翁在债券市场暴跌后保持控制权
item.description:
欧洲的家族企业创始人在经历了伤痕累累的再融资之战后，其帝国的大部分都完好无损。他们中的许多债权人不得不进行大幅减记。【原文：

Europe’s family founders are emerging with much of their empires intact after bruising refinancing battles. Many of their creditors have had to take heavy writedowns.

】

item.title: 贝森特关于银行拯救国债的观点是错误的
item.description:
财政部长希望在银行的资产负债表上为不稳定的美国国债建立一个安全的空间。这可能没那么容易。【原文：

The treasury secretary wants to build a safe space for volatile US government debt on banks’ balance sheets. It may not be so easy.

】

item.title: 石油很便宜，但（目前）还不便宜
item.description:
在过去的 18 个月里，一直到目前的大跌，我都坚定不移地看跌。但游戏规则开始发生变化。【原文：

For the past 18 months and up to the current selloff, I have been indubitably bearish. But the game is starting to change.

】

item.title: 欧元区通胀前景黯淡，欧洲央行减息理由更充分
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，由于美国关税提高，欧元区的通胀率将低于此前的预测，这为欧洲央行本周降息提供了支持。【原文：Euro-area inflation will turn out slower than previously forecast because of higher US tariffs, according to a Bloomberg survey that supports the case for the European Central Bank to cut interest rates this week.】

item.title: 瑞士央行在争夺法郎升值的斗争中抵制负利率冲动
item.description: 据经济学家称，瑞士国家银行今年将避免将利率降至零以下，以努力抑制法郎的强势。【原文：The Swiss National Bank will avoid cutting its interest rate below zero this year in its struggle to contain the strength of the franc, according to economists.】

item.title: 印尼咖啡连锁店 Fore 在雅加达交易首日大涨 34
item.description: PT Fore Kopi Indonesia 在雅加达的首次交易中大涨，原因是投资者认为关税可能会损害当地咖啡连锁店销售熊猫口味拿铁咖啡的能力。【原文：PT Fore Kopi Indonesia soared in its trading debut in Jakarta as investors shrugged off the likelihood of tariffs hurting the local coffee chain’s ability to sell pandan-flavored lattes.】

item.title: 据说海外投资公司将因市场动荡而停止马来西亚首次公开募股计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，在全球股市动荡之际，OCI 控股公司的财务顾问已暂停其马来西亚多晶硅业务的潜在上市工作。【原文：OCI Holdings Co.’s financial advisers have paused work on the potential listing of its Malaysian polysilicon business amid volatility in global stock markets, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 日本将于本周启动高风险的美国关税谈判
item.description: 日本将于本周启动与特朗普政府的高风险贸易谈判，这将为全世界试图从唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税运动中获得喘息机会的国家定下基调。【原文：Japan is set to kick off high-stake trade negotiations with the Trump administration this week, setting the tone for nations around the world that are trying to get a reprieve from President Donald Trump’s tariff campaign.】

item.title: 尽管印尼盾下跌，印尼外汇储备仍创下历史新高
item.description: 尽管全球市场动荡使印尼盾遭受重创，但印尼的外汇储备上个月仍增加了 26 亿美元，再创历史新高。【原文：Indonesia’s foreign exchange reserves gained $2.6 billion last month to reach another record high even as the global markets turmoil battered the rupiah.】

item.title: 花旗称特朗普关税豁免将减少对中国 GDP 的影响
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：President Donald Trump’s latest tariff exemptions on consumer electronics and semiconductors could reduce the negative impact on China’s economy by 0.4 percentage points, if it were to last, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 美国加征关税将导致贸易受阻，中国出口大幅增长
item.description: 中国 3 月份出口反弹，在美国本月对中国大规模加征关税之前为经济注入了活力。【原文：China’s exports rebounded in March, providing a boost to the economy ahead of the massive tariff hikes imposed against it by the US this month.】

item.title: 铜走高，关税缓和令交易商稍感宽慰
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对部分产品的惩罚性关税给予豁免后，铜与大多数其他金属一起走高，提振了整个金融市场的情绪。【原文：Copper edged higher with most other metals after President Donald Trump handed out exemptions to his punishing tariffs on some products, nudging up sentiment across financial markets.】

item.title: 交易商增加套期保值至五年新高，美元担忧加剧
item.description: 由于特朗普政府的关税政策有可能削弱美国的经济特殊性并损害美元，对冲美元潜在跌势的需求已跃升至五年来的最高点。【原文：Demand for hedging against potential dollar declines has jumped to a five-year high as the Trump administration’s tariff policy threatens to sap US economic exceptionalism and undermine the greenback.】

item.title: 中国的关税对策可能增加韩元和韩国债券的压力
item.description: 鉴于双边贸易和竞争压力巨大，如果中国因美国加征关税而大幅贬值韩元，韩国的韩元和债券可能会受到拖累。【原文：South Korea’s won and bonds may be dragged down if China significantly weakens its currency in response to US tariffs, given deep bilateral trade and competitive pressure.】
